mapper.update:
update production
Pro_Name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pro_Type = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pro_Manage = #{proManage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Pro_BeTime = #{proBetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Pro_EndTime = #{proEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Pro_LastTime = #{proLasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Pro_status = #{proStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pro_cang = #{proCang,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Pro_nowGet = #{proNowGet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Pro_status = #{proMonGet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where Pro_Id = #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update production set Pro_Name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Pro_status = #{proStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Pro_Type = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Pro_Manage = #{proManage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Pro_BeTime = #{proBetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Pro_EndTime = #{proEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Pro_LastTime = #{proLasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Pro_Id = #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from production order by Pro_Id
